name: Castle Griffinsteed
description:
The creator of this parody is not associated with  the tuber  Jeremy "Jerma" Elbertson (Jerma985) in any way, shape or form. This is a fan parody re-creation parody of a game created for the following youtube video by "Jerma985". It is a parody based on the video. All copyrights belong to their respective copywriters. 

Painstakingly recreated after spending countless hours analyzing every small detail in the "Castle Griffensteed" video. Originally the project started as a personal project. Facing the question of "Can I do this?". It quickly transitioned into "Why am I doing this?". Which left me with the result of what you see today. I've tried my best, given both the engine's constraints, and my own sanity, to make a true-to-original version of what was shown in the original video.

I've had trouble identifying sounds and music from the original video please leave a comment if you think you've found a missing song or sound or something is in the wrong place

Interesting facts about this project:

  • Made in GameGuru Classic. The same as originally in the video. I think.
  • A lot of the sounds are stock sounds from the GameGuru Classic engine
  • I almost went insane... at least twice...
  • I've spent over 30 hours watching the Castle Griffinsteed video
  • It took over 50 hours to make this
  • The crates inside the warehouse explode.
  • Watch out for the exploding hedgehogs.
  • I don't really know why the animations aren't working
  • OH GOD HE'S INSIDE MY WALLS HELP ME GET HIM OUT PLEASE PL-
